New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 not out off 51 balls, his third T20I century.
India scored 228 for 5, the highest score in the match.
Sri Lanka was dismissed for 137 in 16.4 overs.
Key Match Events: India sealed the series 2-1 with a 91-run victory.
Suryakumar Yadav and Shubman Gill formed a 111-run partnership.
Arshdeep Singh took three wickets for India.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory boosted India's young players' morale.
The series win was a pivotal moment for the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the third of the series.
India's high run rate and spinners' performances were notable.
